NK037(ji)007:0: mgon po tshogs bdag gi mjug chog bzhugs so //
NK037(ji)007:1: mgon po tshogs bdag gi sgrub pa'i las rim thams cad tshar nas /
NK037(ji)007:2: mthar thug dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo zhing smon lam gdab pa ni /
NK037(ji)007:3: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la sa pa ri b+aa ra ar+g+ham sogs /
NK037(ji)007:5: bde gshegs mgon po bstan pa'i dpal //
NK037(ji)007:6: tshogs bdag dgyes pa'i byin rlabs las //
NK037(ji)007:7: sdug bsngal nad sel thugs rje che //
NK037(ji)007:8: thams cad sprul pa'i cho 'phrul dpal //
NK037(ji)007:9: tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag po ste //
NK037(ji)007:10: de bzhin gshegs pas bzhed pa ston //
NK037(ji)007:11: khams gsum khengs pa'i sems can rnams //
NK037(ji)007:12: tshe dang srog la dbang ba ste //
NK037(ji)007:13: shes rab mtshon gyis sgyu mar ston //
NK037(ji)007:14: blun rmongs khengs pa thal bar mdzod //
NK037(ji)007:15: mi mthun phyogs rnams zad par ston //
NK037(ji)007:16: byang chub chen por khyed kyis sgrol //
NK037(ji)007:17: dpal gyi snying po dpal phreng ma //
NK037(ji)007:18: dpal gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK037(ji)007:20: de nas tshogs kyi bdag po'i bshags pa ni /
NK037(ji)007:22: mgon po 'khor bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)007:23: mgon po'i dkyil 'khor sgor zhugs nas //
NK037(ji)007:24: bdag ni ma rig lus ngag sems //
NK037(ji)007:25: nongs pa thams cad bzod par gsol //
NK037(ji)007:26: dam tshig gnyan po bsrung rgyu la //
NK037(ji)007:27: bka' ltar ma gyur rngo ma thogs //
NK037(ji)007:28: bsnyen sgrub phud dang gtor ma chag /
NK037(ji)007:29: rtsa ba yan lag nyams chag kun //
NK037(ji)007:30: mgon po'i tshogs la bzod par gsol //
NK037(ji)007:31: bstan srung mthu yi dngos grub stsol //
NK037(ji)007:32: yi dam rtse gcig bsgom rgyu la //
NK037(ji)007:33: ting 'dzin ma gsal nog par bskyed //
NK037(ji)007:34: bstan srung tshogs la bzod par gsol //
NK037(ji)007:35: bdag gis ma tshor nyams srid pas //
NK037(ji)007:36: phyin chad khyed kyis bzod par gsol //
NK037(ji)007:37: bskang ngo bshags so bzod par gsol //
NK037(ji)007:38: mgon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK037(ji)007:39: bskul zhing dad cing mos pa'i tshe //
NK037(ji)007:40: ma g.yel las rnams myur du 'grub par mdzod //
NK037(ji)007:41: sh+r+ai ma h+aa k+aa la h'u phata /
NK037(ji)007:42: ces sro thog rgyal ba'i dben gnas su chu bo
NK037(ji)007:43: glang lo'i nyer bdun la ldi ri chos kyi grags
NK037(ji)007:44: par yi ger bkod pa rdzogs so //
NK037(ji)007:47: bdag gis mgon po khyed bsgrubs byin rlabs kyis //
NK037(ji)007:48: bstan pa bshigs pa'i dgra dpung 'joms par shog /
NK037(ji)007:49: dam nyams dgra bo las ngan sdig can gyis //
NK037(ji)007:50: phyi nang gsang gsum sgrub pa'i mtshams bkral sogs //
NK037(ji)007:51: gdug sems can rnams myur du sgrol nas kyang //
NK037(ji)007:52: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par shog /
NK037(ji)007:53: gzhan yang stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten du //
NK037(ji)007:54: mu ge nad yams god kha med par shog /
NK037(ji)007:55: lha dang mi yi longs spyod dpal 'byor rnams //
NK037(ji)007:56: nyi zla lta bur kun tu rgyas par shog /
NK037(ji)007:57: rnam par sbyangs pa'i shes rab thob bar shog /
NK037(ji)007:58: bde ba'i don rtogs 'gro ba'i skyabs gyur shog /
NK037(ji)007:59: dngos grub mchog thob 'phags pa'i zhal mthong nas //
NK037(ji)007:60: las kyi don rtogs 'gro ba'i mgon gyur shog /
